column2: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-W8sR2lpUb1Q34UjgKckT-57dIWGmf4PtgNc4wNLsbo/edit?usp=sharing: Analyzes the third fetter as a compassion-driven compulsion to restore moral order
column3: revealing how clinging to external systems blocks the transition to inner liberation.

column1: Knowledge Object: Sīlabbata-Parāmāsa: Cutting the 3rd Fetter KO
column2: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AZnb27aJep2MY6LCE-n7cC1_g1It6x-PTSi3onJ7bUM/edit?usp=sharing: Describes the phenomenological release of sīlabbata-parāmāsa through the relinquishment of moral restorationism and exit from the trap of compulsive reform.

column1: Knowledge Object: Lineage of Moral Exiles KO
column2: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J8Y9vBQ_LWU9T7iQP0cmdqA_g920t_cFqoKS7d6Txy0/edit?usp=sharing: Describes the hidden network of conscience-bearing individuals who preserve sacred knowledge through moral collapse by exiting the restoration trap and transmitting light in exile.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1R__4c5fbUdI6IKQ1P7f122Wkrz7egek1xrrU377Nrk4/edit?usp=sharing: Provides a diagnostic and counter-training architecture for uprooting ten specific social āsavas that collectively obstruct stream entry through reinforcement of the third fetter.
